Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Kingston
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, South Shore, 83rd, Yates and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Kingston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Clark/Division
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
